column5: Anyone want to have another get together like last year? We could do it at the firehall or maybe somewhere a little easier for some members to get to? Or maybe do a fishing G2G? Any input is welcome!
The g2g's at the Firehall used to be a regular event for quite awhile, too bad they kinda petered out.
A  lot of fun. I was at 2 of them but it's getting to be too much of a run for me from north east of Montreal for an evening. I may try to get out there again.
Aren't we doing a g2g on st. clair in a few weeks?
Maybe you muskie guys are, I didn't hear about it.
I'm in for one providing it's not 3 hours away lol
Chris there was a thread about it that Squid started anyone is welcome to come down and join us

A  lot of fun. I was at 2 of them but it's getting to be too much of a run for me from north east of Montreal for an evening. I may try to get out there again. Hey Roy you know that there is always a bed available here anytime...
Hey Roy you know that there is always a bed available here anytime... Gee thanks John but what would Barbara say?
If it's at the Firehall again on a Friday, you can flip a coin at the end of the night and see if your fish n' chip dinner is free.LOL  *should've picked tails
Gee thanks John but what would Barbara say? she said she would only kick you out if you snore...
Not a big deal John... Roy won't take up too much room between you and Barb!
No worries there Wayne as long as he only spoons Barbara and not me..
